revised_title: Healing Properties of Springs in Herefordshire
tldr: The author discusses the healing properties of two springs in Herefordshire, England. One spring is famous for healing eyes, while the other has been effective in treating ulcers and tetters. The healing properties are more effective during long droughts and lasting dry frosts. The author also mentions experimenting with pearl and water to test for healing properties.
